named-native-query.name: KycParameter.getKey
named-native-query.query: SELECT PARAM_KEY,PARAM_VALUE FROM KYC_PARAMETERS WHERE PARAM_KEY = 1?

named-native-query.name: KycLoginHistoric.getCurrentSession
named-native-query.query: SELECT ID,ID_USER,IP,ID_CHANNEL,ID_SESSION,ACTIVE_SESSION,DATE_LOGIN,DATE_LOGOUT FROM KYC_LOGIN_HISTORIC WHERE ID_SESSION = ?1 AND ACTIVE_SESSION = true

named-native-query.name: KycLoginHistoric.getCurrentSessionOnChannel
named-native-query.query: SELECT ID,ID_USER,IP,ID_CHANNEL,ID_SESSION,ACTIVE_SESSION,DATE_LOGIN,DATE_LOGOUT FROM KYC_LOGIN_HISTORIC WHERE ID_USER = ?1 AND ID_CHANNEL = ?2 AND ACTIVE_SESSION = true
